summary: Hidden behind the vales of this small town lays a troubling secret. For not everything about the townfolk of Ardorn\'s Dale is as simple as it seems, or as clean. Journey into forgotton towers and dig into the deeps of lost caverns in search of something none can explain, something that could very well reshape your destiny.
descriptionHtml:

====================== Thanks ======================

A very special thanks to LoganGFX for his work on Baniutya in her Dragon form! You may known LoganGFX has the author of the \"Chromatic Dragon Pack For Good Characters\" and many other great Texture works! You can find is mod listed below.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4030

Also must thank hothtrooper44 for the use of his Vanguard Armor! He has many other great works, but the one used is listed below. Check it out.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16238

====================== Permissions======================

LoganGFX created the Texture for Baniutya has a special Request for this mod and myself, no one else may use this Texture without first getting premission for myself!
